ALL_PAYS_EXCEPT_SCATTER:
(color:#ffffff)ALL PAYS EXCEPT (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER (color:#ffffff)PAYS ARE ADJACENT ON AN ACTIVE PAYLINE.
ALL PAYS EXCEPT (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER (color:#ffffff)PAYS ARE LEFT TO RIGHT ON AN ACTIVE PAYLINE
STARTING WITH THE LEFTMOST REEL. ONLY HIGHEST WIN PAID PER LINE PLAYED.
ONLY HIGHEST (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER (color:#ffffff)WIN PAID. ONLY ONE (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER (color:#ffffff)WIN PAID PER PLAY. ALL (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER
(color:#ffffff)PAYS ARE ON WITHIN ONE POSITION OF FIRST PAYLINE. (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER (color:#ffffff)PAYS ARE PAID IN
ADDITION ON LINE WINS. LINE PAYS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE NUMBER OF CREDITS BET
ON THE PAYLINE. (color:#e9dfbf)SCATTER (color:#ffffff)PAYS ARE MULTIPLIED BY TOTAL CREDITS BET. (color:#e9dfbf)FREE SPINS
(color:#ffffff)CAN BE RETRIGGERED UP TO 50. MALFUNCION VOIDS ALL PAYS AND PLAYS.
Dragon_is_wild_and:
(color:#e9dbbb)Wild Foo Dog(color:#ffffff) substitutes for all symbols except
(color:#e9dbbb)Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang(color:#ffffff) and (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Coin(color:#ffffff)
Coin_is_wild_and:
(color:#e9dbbb)Wild Coin(color:#ffffff) substitutes for all symbols except
(color:#e9dbbb)Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang(color:#ffffff) and (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Foo Dog(color:#ffffff)
Wild_fortune_cat:
(color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff) does not substitute for (color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang(color:#ffffff) or (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Foo Dog(color:#ffffff)
(color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang(color:#ffffff) does not substitute for (color:#e9dbbb)Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff), (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff) or (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Foo Dog
(color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang(color:#ffffff) and (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang(color:#ffffff) are scatters
(color:#e9dbbb)Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff) and (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff) are scatters
3_Scattered_Ying_Yang:
(color:#ffffff)3 Scattered (color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang (color:#ffffff)or (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang (color:#ffffff)appearing anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4 awards 10 free spins. 3
Scattered (color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang (color:#ffffff)or (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang (color:#ffffff)appearing anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4 during the Free Game Bonus
awards an additional 10 free spins. Additional free spins are added to the remaining Free Spins. During Free
Game Bonus, Wild Coin Mystery Feature will trigger after each spin. Free Games are played on alternate reels.
All free games are plated with the stake that were in play when the free games were started. Free game Bonus
ends when no Free Games remain. Free Games Bonus paid in addition to line pays. Pick Bonus is not available
during Free Game Bonus.
All_prizes_are_for_combinations:
All pays except scatter pays are left to right on an active payline starting from the leftmost reel. Only the highest
win is paid per line played. All pays except scatter pays are adjacent on an active payline. Scatter pays are paid
for symbols appearing in any position on the reels. Paytable is dynamic and reflects actual payouts based on
current bet. Wins on different lines are added together and scatter wins (if available) are added to payline
wins. Malfunction Voids all pays and plays.
Any_base_game_spin_may:
(color:#ffffff)Any base game spin may trigger Wild Coin Mystery Feature. At the completion of each spin, if triggered, the tree
will shake and 2-7 coins will fall, turning symbols where they land into a wild. During the Free Game Bonus
Feature, Wild Coin Mystery Feature will trigger after each spin and 3-7 coins will fall, turning symbols where they
land into a wild. If a coin lands to (color:#e9dbbb)Ying Yang (color:#ffffff)it will change to (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Ying Yang (color:#ffffff)and be both Free Games Bonus
trigger and wild on active payline. If a coin lands on a (color:#e9dbbb)Fortune Cat (color:#ffffff)it will change to (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat (color:#ffffff)and be both
Pick Bonus Retrigger and wild on active payline. If a coin lands on a (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Foo Dog (color:#ffffff)it will remain (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Foo Dog(color:#ffffff).
Three_scatter_fortune_cat:
(color:#ffffff)3 Scatter (color:#e9dbbb)Fortune Cat (color:#ffffff)or (color:#e9dbbb)Wild Fortune Cat(color:#ffffff), appearing anywhere on reels 1, 3 and 5, triggers the Pick Bonus.
The final award to the player will be multiplied with the total bet.
Player chooses one of the three Pick spheres shown on the screen
revealing 6-12, 14 or 15 picks awarded for the feature.
During_the_Pick_Bonus_feature:
During  the  Pick  Bonus  feature,  the  player  will  choose positions  from  a  grid  and pick symbols will  be
revealed. Any  matching Pick symbols  that  have been revealed will pay according  to  the  Pick Bonus
Paytable. Only the highest number of matches of each Pick symbol is paid. The Pick Bonus feature ends
when no more picks remain. Pick Bonus paid in addition to line pays.
RTP: The theoretical average return to player (RTP) is %rtpValue%
